categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Stanwu was a male Major of the Sith Empire during the Cold War. A liaison between the Empire and the hired bounty hunters, he gave the order to execute the Mandalorian Clan Spar on the lies told to him by Mandalorian Tayari Rook. Rook presented evidence that Clan Spar reneged on the contract to destroy a transport ship full of young Jedi. Stanwu was later visited by the last surviving member of the clan, Akaavi Spar, who interrogated him, but left him alive.
